description: This source file implements the WebRooFsm Object with functions for creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It defines methods related to managing FSM (Finite State Machine) in a web server/client context, including setting up object identity, copying name strings, and binding function pointers.

classes.name: WEB_ROO_FSM_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the Web Root FSM Object with configurable methods and properties.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE WebRooFsmCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs a new WebRooFsm object, initializes core fields, and sets function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRooFsmRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the WebRooFsm object, performing cleanup.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRooFsmEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls any additional objects necessary for the FSM object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRooFsmInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the FSM object, including setting identifiers and method function pointers.
